net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator

  • Packages that use AbstractValidator 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale
    Provides an internationalization framework for MIWT.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation
    This package contains classes related to component validation.

    • Uses of AbstractValidator in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RequiredLocalizationValidator
      Validator for LocalizedObjectKeyFieldComponent that requires at least one localization with content.

    • Uses of AbstractValidator in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

      Subclasses of AbstractValidator in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CompositeValidator
      A validator based on the validation of one or more other validator instances.
      class  DoubleRangeValidator
      Validates an text input that it is a valid double and in a range of values.
      class  LongRangeValidator
      Validates an text input that it is a valid long and in a range of values.
      class  PassAllValidator
      A validator instance that always returns valid.
      class  RegularExpressionValidator
      Validates a component based on a regular expression.
      class  RequiredValueValidator
      Validates that a value is required.
      class  StringValueValidator
      A base class for validators that use a String value for validation.
      class  ValidRegularExpressionValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid RegularExpression.
      class  ValidURIValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid URI.
      class  ValidURLValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid URL.
      class  XMLFragmentMIWTValidator
      Validator for XML fragments.
